document_data.name: Thoaburr
document_data.mainbody: '''Thoaburr''' was a [[War Wizard]] of [[Cormyr]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Thoaburr was a part of the retinue of the [[Royal Magician of Cormyr]], [[Caladnei]], in the early spring of {{yearlink|1373}}, when they raided the [[Marsember]] meeting of the [[Rightful Conspiracy]]. He was assigned afterwards to hunt down [[Beltrar Morgrin]].
